description:
VMware warns that authenticated malicious users could enter specially crafted SQL queries and perform unauthorized read/write operations in the database.

The post VMware Patches Critical SQL-Injection Flaw in Aria Automation appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: VMware Patches Critical SQL-Injection Flaw in Aria Automation

description:
Israeli startup raises $16 million in seed funding to build what is being described as a “cyber crisis readiness and management” platform.

The post Cytactic Snags $16M Seed Funding for Cyber Crisis Management Technology appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Cytactic Snags $16M Seed Funding for Cyber Crisis Management Technology

description:
Citrix rolls out patches for multiple security vulnerabilities, including critical and high-severity issues in the NetScaler product line.

The post Citrix Patches Critical NetScaler Console Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Citrix Patches Critical NetScaler Console Vulnerability

description:
Few people understand AI, nor how to use nor control it, nor where it is going. Yet politicians wish to regulate it.

The post Can AI be Meaningfully Regulated, or is Regulation a Deceitful Fudge? appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Can AI be Meaningfully Regulated, or is Regulation a Deceitful Fudge?

description:
The US and allies blame Russian state-sponsored threat actors for using Meliorator AI software to create a social media bot farm.

The post US Disrupts AI-Powered Russian Bot Farm on X appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: US Disrupts AI-Powered Russian Bot Farm on X

description:
Several ICS vendors released advisories on Tuesday to inform customers about vulnerabilities found in industrial and OT products.

The post ICS Patch Tuesday: Siemens, Schneider Electric, CISA Issue Advisories appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: ICS Patch Tuesday: Siemens, Schneider Electric, CISA Issue Advisories

description:
A cyber resilience strategy is vital for business continuity and can provide a range of benefits before, during, and after a cyberattack.

The post It’s Time to Reassess Your Cybersecurity Priorities appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: It’s Time to Reassess Your Cybersecurity Priorities
